direction: Use a time-series-based forecasting strategy with an AR(1) model. Adjust the model by incorporating a moving average component to form an ARMA(1,1) model. Use the following settings: AR order = 1, MA order = 1. For preprocessing, ensure that any missing values in the time series data are filled using forward fill. If the model encounters convergence issues, reduce the MA order to 0 and retry.
executor_guidance: Make sure to handle any NaN values in the time series data by using forward fill before fitting the model. If you encounter convergence issues with the ARMA(1,1) model, reduce the MA order to 0 and try fitting an AR(1) model instead.
